name: @popperjs/core

scripts.build: yarn clean && yarn build:es && yarn build:esbrowser && yarn build:bundles && yarn build:flow && yarn build:typescript
scripts.build:typescript: rimraf dist/typescript; flow-to-ts "src/**/*.js" --write --inline-utility-types; node typescript/ts.js --project .config/tsconfig.json --outDir lib; rimraf "src/**/*.ts"
scripts.clean: rimraf lib && rimraf dist && rimraf test/visual/dist
